## LocalState type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type LocalState = {
    root: UseStore<RootState>;
    objects: Instance[];
    parent: Instance | null;
    primitive?: boolean;
    eventCount: number;
    handlers: Partial<EventHandlers>;
    attach?: AttachType;
    previousAttach?: any;
    memoizedProps: {
        [key: string]: any;
    };
};
```
